statements: DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE id = 1 AND date = '2022-07-01';
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE conversion_rate < 10 AND traffic_source = 'Organic';
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE visitor_id = 100 AND referral_source = 'google';
DELETE FROM marketing_content WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE page_visited = 'product_page' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE visitor_id = 1001 AND visitor_ip = '192.168.1.1'
DELETE FROM marketing_content WHERE content_id = 500 AND published_date < '2021-10-01'
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE id = 100 AND page_visited = 'homepage';
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
